mapper.insert: insert into test_result (paper_id, sub_time, score, s_right, m_right, t_right, s_total, m_total, t_total) values(#{paperId}, #{subTime}, #{score}, #{sRight}, #{mRight}, #{tRight}, #{sTotal}, #{mTotal}, #{tTotal})
mapper.select: select id, paper_id, sub_time, score, s_right, m_right, t_right, s_total, m_total, t_total from test_result where paper_id = #{paperId}
